titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation concerning wine-licenses
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at White-hall this five and twentieth day of August, 1663, in the fifteenth year of our reign."
Printed as broadside, now in three sheets.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
